sentences.sContent: We took a gravel road that meandered through farmland.
sentences.sCn: 我们走上了一条蜿蜒穿越农田的石子路。

remMethod.val: me (我) + and (和) + er (看作her， 她) → 我和她一起漫步在河边， 看河水蜿蜒而流 → 蜿蜒而流

trans.tranOther: if a river, stream, road etc meanders, it has a lot of bends rather than going in a straight line
